nasaspaceops1940130307212038641.content: . @NASA astronaut Anil Menon will embark on his first mission to the @Space_Station , serving as a flight engineer and Expedition 75 crew member. Menon will launch aboard the Roscosmos Soyuz MS-29 spacecraft in June 2026, accompanied by Roscosmos cosmonauts Pyotr Dubrov and Anna
nasaspaceops1940130307212038641.author: nasaspaceops

nasaspaceops1933906584595255456.content: . @NASA , @Axiom_Space , and @SpaceX are reviewing launch opportunities no earlier than Thursday, June 19, for the fourth private astronaut mission to the @Space_Station , Axiom Mission 4.
